name: Notion Budgeting Template
description: Budgeting Template for Notion and Google Sheets.The 50/30/20 rule is a simple and effective method for managing your finances and achieving your financial goals. By using the 50/30/20 rule template, I show you how it works, and how you can use it to take control of your finances.
